channel.title: Black Mesa - HL2 Reverse Double-Retcon Mod!
channel.description: Would it not be the pinnacle of awesomeness if, once Black Mesa is released, some samaritan were to use Black Mesa art assets to retcon HL2 to be more consistent with HL1? For example, all antlions would be replaced with bullsquids, striders would be replaced with gargantua, combine and elites would be replaced with Vorts and Agrunts, and so on. :freeman:

item.title: Black Mesa - HL2 Reverse Double-Retcon Mod!
item.dc:creator: dky.tehkingd.u
item.description:
So… Bullsquid in HL2 and that’s it? I don’t mind.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa - HL2 Reverse Double-Retcon Mod!

item.title: Black Mesa - HL2 Reverse Double-Retcon Mod!
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Raminator:

That’d give you the art assets, but there’s a little more to a functional NPC than what it looks like.

Valve Developer Wiki:

Entity description

Although there are no physical bullsquid resources provided in Half-Life 2, the npc_bullsquid entity is fully supported in code.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa - HL2 Reverse Double-Retcon Mod!

item.title: Black Mesa - HL2 Reverse Double-Retcon Mod!
item.dc:creator: dky.tehkingd.u
item.description:
Just copy all the content from BM (and rename if necessary) to the correct HL2 folder, and there you have it. More or less.

item.title: Black Mesa - HL2 Reverse Double-Retcon Mod!
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
Now I’m suddenly saddened Route Kanal lacked bullsquids.

Fix it

though I think I know why they weren’t there originally - - it’d be blasphemy to run over a bullsquid with the mudskipper. It’d be like a limitless force acting on an infinite mass, causing a divide-by-zero.

Metrocops: Barneys
Citizen: Scientist
Rebel: alien Slave
Ant lion: Houndeye
Manhacks: more houndeyes
Strider: Gonarch
Rollermine: Bullsquid (with a number of entities added throughout Route Kanal, and on along the beach)
Combine elite: female Assassin
Fast zombie: more female Assassins
Fast headcrab: alien Controller
Poison zombie: Xen-tree
Poison headcrab: alien Grunt
Helicopter: Apache
Gunship: more Apache
Dropship: Osprey

It seems obvious in posispect!!!

Read full topic

item.source: Black Mesa - HL2 Reverse Double-Retcon Mod!

item.title: Black Mesa - HL2 Reverse Double-Retcon Mod!
item.dc:creator: Grey_Acumen
item.description:
Yeah, I’ll cast my lot here. Essentially, while it might be “cool” and amusing to do what the original poster suggested, the premise behind his stated reasoning is completely flawed. Replacing antlions and striders and combine with bullsquid, gargantua and hecu wouldn’t make HL2 consistent with HL1 at all, it would just cause the storyline of HL2 make no sense at all.

Read full topic
